snippet: HARPER--Lee. The American Academy of Arts and Letters notes with sadness the death of our esteemed colleague. "To Kill a Mockingbird" remains a primer for the possibility of racial justice. The most-assigned book in American public schools, its looming questions are underwritten with reason and buttressed by a child's pure faith. 1/3
